column4: are you using esd (do you have enabled sound events in gnome)?
and got my Intel graphics working
system->preferences->sound ... "enable sound server startup", is it checked? if it is, try to uncheck it, close the dialog, restart firefox/mozilla, and visit the web page with the flash content
which version of ubuntu are you running, and which browser are you using?
in the location, type: "about:plugins" (without the quotes), is "Shockware Flash" (libflashplayer.so) listed?
ptlo; when i went to a page that had flash with sound mozilla wanted to automaticlly install it so i let it i go to about:plugins and i get the flash shopwing up
ok, open a new terminal and type: pidof esd <enter> ... does that output some number, or gives no output?
ok, type this in the terminal: kill -9 24831
then, restart firefox and check if it works again
the above line will kill the sound server
